name: cbvmo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: bitri(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, w1), wmo(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, w1))
-| wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wb(wmo(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wmo(s1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, w1))
-| wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wb(wmo(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wmo(s1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, w1))
-| wb(wmo(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wmo(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wmo(s1, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.) (Revised by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Jan-2023.)
